originalText.text:
Working with LoHo realty was a great experience. The staff helped me and my wife acquire our apartment in a coop. The team helped through the entire process, from walking into all the apartments to show through completing and submitting the application to the board interview. Once those hurdles were completed the team helped ensure that closing was going to be as easy as possible. We had such a great experience with them that when another family member was interested in buying a place in Manhattan we suggested she contact LoHo realty. She also got the same treatment and now lives a few floors below us.

Thank you again LoHo Realty!!!

originalText.text: Working with LoHo reality was an absolute delight. Jacob and Leora and Samantha were great to work with and really helped facilitate and walk us through the whole process of the purchase, and co-op approval etc. They know the area, the co-ops, and the process really well, and are also just all around fun team to work with.

text.text: Working with LoHo reality was an absolute delight. Jacob and Leora and Samantha were great to work with and really helped facilitate and walk us through the whole process of the purchase, and co-op approval etc. They know the area, the co-ops, and the process really well, and are also just all around fun team to work with.

originalText.text: Jacob at Loho found me my dream apartment. After a lifetime of renting, I was looking for a starter apartment that matched at least one of my criteria for my first home purchase. Jacob showed me the place that exceeded my expectations and had ALL the things I was looking for.  He knows all the ins and outs of the LES and advised me through the whole process. This is my forever home now and I’m very grateful.

originalText.text:
The LOHO team is very easy to work with . We were encouraged by all the members of the team and they gave us support . All questions were answered in a timely manner . They walked us through every step from preparing the apartment for selling to the closing .They were patient and honest and knowledgeable . Also very good communicators . I highly recommend LOHO
as your realty team . Everyone was superb !!

Renée R.

originalText.text:
I’m highly impressed with my real estate agent’s exceptional service!
Their deep knowledge  of the market and commitment to finding the perfect tenant, made the entire process smooth and stress-free. Great communication and attention to detail.
Thank you for your outstanding work.
